name: Treasure_DC
description:
You've hit the jackpot! Collect as much treasure as possible by destroying the crates and collecting the falling treasure. But don't fall off the ship!

This is the first game developed by the Durham College team consisting of: Ethan Brodie, Tara Brodie, Kelsey Chea,  Visal Chea, Samson Chung, Briar Jamieson and Tyler Perras.
